page_settings_showlogs.log_empty: The log could not be loaded.

page_settings_showlogs.no_log_note: No log files were found for {{date}}

page_settings_confirm.delete_list_note: Request confirmation when deleting a list.
page_settings_confirm.delete_listitem_note: Request confirmation when deleting a list item.
page_settings_confirm.empty_list_note: Request confirmation when emptying a list.
page_settings_confirm.erase_list_note: Request confirmation when finally removing a list from the trash.
page_settings_confirm.erase_listitem_note: Request confirmation when finally removing a list item from the trash.
page_settings_confirm.empty_trash_note: Request confirmation when emptying the trash.
page_settings_confirm.restore_list_note: Request confirmation when restoring a list from the trash.
page_settings_confirm.restore_listitem_note: Request confirmation when restoring a listitem from the trash.
page_settings_confirm.undo_warning: Warning: The action can not be undone!
page_settings_confirm.transmit_list_note: Request confirmation when transferring a list to a watch.

page_lists_transmission.openontransmit: Open app after transmitting a list
page_lists_transmission.openontransmit_note: Request on your watch whether the app should be opened when you transfer a list.
page_lists_transmission.deletelist: Automatically delete lists from the watch
page_lists_transmission.deletelist_note: When deleting a list on your smartphone, also delete the list on your watch.

page_settings_trash.use_trash_note: Move lists to the trash when deleting instead of permanently removing them.
page_settings_trash.use_trash_listitem_note:
Move list items to the trash instead of permanently removing them.
A separate trash bin is used for each list.
page_settings_trash.instock: Keep list items in the trash
page_settings_trash.instock_note: How long should old lists or list items be kept in the trash?

page_appinfos.support:
I developed this app in my spare time and without financial ulterior motives.
It is and remains free and open source.

If you like it and want to support me,
then why don't you buy me a coffee?
page_appinfos.review: Or write a nice review in the Garmin ConnectIQ Store
page_appinfos.website: For my other projects, visit my website:
